data.name: In The Days of My Life
data.detailed_description:
A game about personal struggles, ambitions, losses, self-love, and respect. Served in a beautifully rendered, immersive, and atmospheric world with lovable characters.

Experience the exhausting life of Dewi, a college student in Indonesia, and guide her through life's burdens as societal, financial, and peer pressure grows immensely as she makes questionable or even extreme choices. Lead her through her days by performing activities, some presented as mini-games, and enjoy exciting encounters in a beautifully atmospheric rendition of an Indonesian City. But remember that your actions have consequences, for Dewi and also everyone else. Will you be able to help Dewi stay sane and functional?

Meet Dewi!


As a girl from the countryside, Dewi is experiencing exhausting college life in a big city where she tries to pursue her studies through immense financial and peer pressure, while under constant verbal abuse from her now-jobless father. Now living with perpetual duress, Dewi’s social and academic life is being threatened as she tries to make friends, pursue a passing grade, taking part-time jobs, all the while suffering her degrading mental health.

Explore Beautifully Atmospheric Rendition of Indonesian City!



  • Evocative Narrative Gameplay meets Enacted Narrative Gameplay; We tell our stories through subtle environmental changes, and characters' speech nuances, while also offering straight streamlined story-telling.
  • Interactive dialogue system
  • NPC progression that actually affects overall player relationship and progression with other NPCs.
  • Important/Pivotal choices have subtle effects on the environment, player/NPC attitude, and overall atmosphere. The player bedroom might appear more cluttered or tidy depending on affinity (i.e. mental health), NPC might appear gloomy depending on events, etc.
  • Player Affinity/Karma (good - neutral - evil) that affects the subtle nuances of either speeches, choices, or visual expression.
  • Player Stats, e.g. Knowledge, Empathy, Looks, Courage, that can unlock new choices, or side activities.
  • Time-locked/Scheduled activities and story progression,
  • Immerse yourself in a beautifully atmospheric rendition of Indonesian city. Discover and visit landmarks, shops, and other notable places. Unlock side activities such as part-time jobs and hobbies from certain locations.
